description.ko: 백색광이 유리를 통해 선명한 색상과 에너지의 배열로 부서지는 광학 물리학의 탐구입니다.
description.en: An exploration of optical physics where white light is shattered into a vibrant array of colors and energy through glass.

prompt: Hyper-realistic macro photography of a complex geometric glass prism hit by a concentrated beam of white light. The prism explodes into a web of #FF0080 magenta, #00FF80 mint, and #8000FF violet spectral shards. Intense light dispersion, #FFFF00 yellow chromatic aberration, and rainbow caustics dancing on a dark reflective surface. 8k, raytracing, the chaotic beauty of pure light refraction and energy.
